Come and try an exercise that
is going to change your life!

PILATES will not only redefine your body, but your very definition of fitness. Pilates Fit Lab offers a unique approach to a well known exercise. At our studio you will experience Pilates through the eyes of Viveca Jensen, Swedish native, studio owner and head trainer. With an intimate setting, positive energy and personalized programs you will encounter an hour of full dedication to helping you attain your goal. With your trainer you will discover your inner-strength through the mental and physical discipline of Pilates.
